sentence.Network_en: The moves in chess are not only manifold, but involute.
sentence.Network_cn: 下棋的走法不但多种多样, 而且错综复杂.

sentence.Network_en: The involute progression of hallucination is strange.
sentence.Network_cn: 幻觉的复杂的发展过程很奇特.

sentence.Network_en: This paper introduces calculation and measurement of BRITISH Standard Involute splines.
sentence.Network_cn: 介绍了平齿根齿侧配合英制渐开线花键计算、测量的基本公式及方法.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 查看完整版本: [-- Auto CAD 的绘渐开线(involute)的程序(LISP文件) --]... 渐开线起始圆, 对齿轮本身是 “F”点 ,对啮合则是进啮点A(或出啮点E).
渐伸线(involute)(或称渐开线(evolent))和渐屈线(evolute)是曲线的微分几何上互为表里的概念。若曲线A是曲线B的渐伸线,曲线B是曲线A的渐屈线。.
involuntary 非自愿的involute 纷乱的involuted 纷乱的
involucre 总苞involute 内卷的involution 退化

point ideal 点理想point involution 点列对合point lattice 点格
汽车英语速查手册(转载)_英语杂谈_天涯论坛 ... involute 渐开[伸]线(的) involute gear 渐开线齿轮 ion 离子.
...配合精神分裂症的其他症状不难诊断本病。(二)更年期精神病(involutional psychosis)临床上偶见到易人综合征，其主要精神症状为焦虑、忧郁、疑病和猜疑.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Latin involutus, past participle of involvere (see involve)

means.word_mean: 1. especially of petals or leaves in bud; having margins rolled inward
2. (of some shells) closely coiled so that the axis is obscured
